issues.impact: All API endpoints returning 500 errors, no user registration/login possible

issues.details: TypeError: logger.error is not a function
issues.impact: API error handling broken, returning HTML error pages instead of JSON
issues.evidence: Multiple "logger.error is not a function" errors in server output

issues.impact: Session management and caching not working, continuous reconnection attempts

issues.details: APIs returning HTML error pages instead of JSON
issues.impact: Client applications cannot properly handle API errors
issues.evidence: Test results show HTML responses for failed API calls

issues.issue: User registration and login not working
issues.impact: No user authentication possible, game features inaccessible
issues.evidence: Registration and login tests all failing with 500 status
Admin login test failing with 500 status

steps: Verify PostgreSQL is running and accessible
Check database credentials in environment variables
Ensure database exists and user has proper permissions
Check logger module import and initialization
Verify logger.error function is properly defined
Ensure logger is properly exported and imported
Update error handlers to return JSON responses
Add proper error codes and messages
Test error responses in all endpoints
Test user model and authentication routes
Verify JWT token generation and validation
Test complete registration and login flow

executiveSummary.estimatedRepairTime: 2-4 hours for critical issues, 1-2 days for complete restoration

workingFeatures.details: All game assets, HTML, JS, CSS files served correctly
workingFeatures.performance: Good response times (1-300ms for most assets)

workingFeatures.details: Real-time communication established, can receive events
All core game files accessible (GameConfig, GridManager, etc.)
workingFeatures.performance: Large assets load within acceptable timeframes

workingFeatures.details: Login page accessible, proper security redirects
Unauthorized access properly blocked where working

brokenFeatures.details: PostgreSQL authentication failure prevents all DB operations
brokenFeatures.impact: No user management, game state, or admin functions

brokenFeatures.details: Registration and login endpoints returning 500 errors
brokenFeatures.impact: No user access to game features

brokenFeatures.details: Spin, game-state, and most game endpoints failing
APIs returning HTML error pages instead of JSON
brokenFeatures.impact: Client applications cannot handle errors properly
